builders.user_data: CreateObject("WScript.Shell").run("cmd.exe /c powershell Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned & winrm set winrm/config/service/auth @{Basic=""true""} & winrm set winrm/config/service @{AllowUnencrypted=""true""} & winrm quickconfig -q & sc config WinRM start= auto & winrm get winrm/config/service")

Dim oFileSystem 
 Set oFileSystem = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") 
 If Not (oFileSystem.FolderExists("C:\temp")) Then 
 oFileSystem.CreateFolder("C:\temp") 
 End If 
 If Not (oFileSystem.FolderExists("C:\temp\my_folder")) Then 
 oFileSystem.CreateFolder("C:\temp\my_folder") 
 End If)
